description: Triangular array T read by rows: T(n,0)=T(n,n)=1 for n >= 0; for n >= 2 and 1<=k<=n-1, T(n,k)=T(n-1,k-1)+T(n-1,k) if k or n-k is of form 2h for h=1,2,...,[ n/4 ], else T(n,k)=T(n-1,k-1)+T(n-2,k-1)+T(n-1,k).
formula: T(n, k) = number of paths from (0, 0) to (n-k, k) in the directed graph having vertices (i, j) and edges (i, j)-to-(i+1, j) and (i, j)-to-(i, j+1) for i, j >= 0 and edges (i, j)-to-(i+1, j+1) for i even and j >= i and for j even and i >= j.
author: _Clark Kimberling_
